Name: all_ligand_chains_present
Description: all the ligand chains detected for the system are present in the system CIF, PDB and SDF files

Name: all_protein_chains_present
Description: all the protein chains detected for the system are present in the system CIF, PDB and SDF files

Name: complex_loadbable_via_biotite
Description: the complex can successfully be loaded with the biotite library

Name: ligand_is_obabel_loadable
Description: the ligand can successfully be loaded with the OpenBabel library

Name: ligand_is_obabel_loadable_with_rdkit_fix
Description: the ligand can successfully be loaded with the OpenBabel library after fixing valence and chirality issues

Name: ligand_is_rdkit_loadable
Description: the ligand can successfully be loaded with the RDKit library

Name: ligand_is_rdkit_loadable_with_fix
Description: the ligand can successfully be loaded with the RDKit library after fixing valence and chirality issues

Name: ligand_loadbable_via_biotite
Description: the ligand can successfully be loaded with the biotite library

Name: ligand_matches_smiles_atom_num
Description: the number of atoms in the saved ligand matches the expected number from the resolved SMILES

Name: ligand_positions_correct
Description: the positions of the saved ligand atoms match the expected positions from the PDB entry

Name: ligand_protein_neighbor_still_preserved_complex
Description: the neighboring protein chains of the saved complex match what was annotated from the PDB entry
